name: Skanda Nagaraja
summary: High-velocity CS senior leveraging stats + AI to build impactful software and drive innovation in real-world engineering teams.

bullets: Built backend microservices on AWS SageMaker and Databricks to serve model-optimization endpoints for real-time product analytics.
Prototyped text-to-image flows and refined prompt engineering + RAG pipelines to power an AI design tool for designers in Slack.
Led refactors and migrations across 5+ cross-functional projects to modernize enterprise architecture and improve long-term scalability.
Orchestrated Oracle report parsing with PySpark and Azure DevOps, accelerating CRM data updates by 30%.
Automated ingestion from 3 disparate sources into Snowflake, enabling real-time market insights for a 20-member cross-functional team.
Built an ML pipeline to analyze sales and identified profitability drivers, informing fixes for major budget overruns.

projects.name: SHIELDS — L3 Harris Capstone
projects.description: Agentic remediation framework that autonomously triages and patches system vulns; improved closure rates by 65%. LLM-driven design with Nessus and OpenSCAP via Pydantic + FastAPI; featured in a peer-reviewed AI paper.

projects.name: Panda Express POS System
projects.description: Next.js kiosk + manager dashboard processing ~15 orders/hr (+20% volume). Full-stack PostgreSQL APIs for orders, staffing, and sales reporting; led sprints for a 5-person team.

projects.name: Quant Wise
projects.description: Flask backtester on Yahoo Finance enabling 10+ years of simulations; 30+ TA-Lib indicators in React dashboard; automated daily signals with Python + CRON.

projects.name: MoneyMind
projects.description: Gamified financial education with generative AI. Next.js frontend, OpenAI-personalized quizzes and suggestions; MongoDB persistence.

awards.name: Meloy Entrepreneurial Fellow
awards.desc: MEIEP recognition for high‑potential Aggie leaders; speaker series + industry mentorship.
